1.0.0.name: wordpress/notfoundorg-404-page
1.0.0.description:
The goal of this plugin is to make is really easy for someone on Wordpress to implement the NotFound.org missing child page in place of their standard 404 page.

The HTTP 404 is the error that you see when a link is broken, or you navigated to web page that just isn't there. It happens, and it's one of the most common error pages you see.

Why not turn that into something that benefits the world? The more eyes that see a missing child, the more likely someone could be found.

Note: Activating this plugin will automatically replace your default Wordpress 404 page. To stop it, simply deactivate.

All of the missing child notices are served within an iframe pointing to NotFound.org.

@_kennyk_ for updates, or visit codefury.net
